document_data.name: Telliann
document_data.mainbody: '''Telliam''' was a [[human]] [[mercenary]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/195/That Which Never Sleeps|4}}
document_data.Description: Telliam was a slender woman with dark hair.{{Cite dungeon/195/That Which Never Sleeps|6}}
document_data.Activities: Telliam was one of the [[Mintarn]] mercenaries hired by the [[New Neverwinter]] organization to protect Neverwinter. She was an aide to Lord [[Dagult Neverember]].
document_data.History:
Around [[1479 DR]], Telliam contacted a group of [[adventurer]]s to help her solve a series of mysterious murders in Neverwinter.{{Cite dungeon/195/That Which Never Sleeps|10-11}}

She was one of the few [[Neverwinter Guard]]s who survived the aboleth's attack.{{Cite dungeon/195/That Which Never Sleeps|25}}
